#The changes for each release

= The changes for the version 0.6 =

  * implement mathml tags: ms, mspace and mpadded
  * use attributes stretchy, maxsize, and minsize for arrows
  * change fontsize --> mathsize and fontcolor --> mathcolor to conform with MatML 2.0 standard
  * implement mathbackground
  * implement the code to have colors "aqua", "black", "blue", "fuchsia", "gray", "green", "lime", "maroon", "nav
y", "olive", "purple", "red", "silver", "teal", "white", and "yellow"
